cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
project(mini2_grpc CXX)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

# Find required packages
find_package(Protobuf REQUIRED)
find_package(gRPC CONFIG REQUIRED)

# Proto files
set(PROTO_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/proto")
set(PROTO_FILE "${PROTO_PATH}/fire_service.proto")

# Generated files
set(PROTO_SRCS "${PROTO_PATH}/fire_service.pb.cc")
set(PROTO_HDRS "${PROTO_PATH}/fire_service.pb.h")
set(GRPC_SRCS "${PROTO_PATH}/fire_service.grpc.pb.cc")
set(GRPC_HDRS "${PROTO_PATH}/fire_service.grpc.pb.h")

# Note: Proto files should already be generated by protoc
# If they're not generated, run:
# protoc --cpp_out=. --grpc_out=. --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=`which grpc_cpp_plugin` proto/fire_service.proto

# Include directories
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
include_directories(${PROTO_PATH})
include_directories(${Protobuf_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Client executable
add_executable(fire_client
    client/client.cpp
    ${PROTO_SRCS}
    ${GRPC_SRCS}
)

# Link libraries
target_link_libraries(fire_client
    gRPC::grpc++
    gRPC::grpc++_reflection
    protobuf::libprotobuf
)

# Set output directory
set_target_properties(fire_client PROPERTIES
    RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build"
)

message(STATUS "====================================")
message(STATUS "Mini2 gRPC C++ Client Build Config")
message(STATUS "====================================")
message(STATUS "Protobuf version: ${Protobuf_VERSION}")
message(STATUS "Proto files: ${PROTO_FILE}")
message(STATUS "Build type: ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}")
message(STATUS "====================================")
